2 ¬Ω Week Steep

‚ñ∫Vape - Changes

\- Flavor Description: Natural & Unripe. Lightly Tart ‚ÄúRounded‚Äù Papaya flavor with a Finer, Crisp Citrus edge (Dominate); married to Subtle notes of a Ripe Hard\* Green Mango. Light Body with a Smooth/Clean Mouthfeel.

‚ñ∫ Notes

\- Off Notes: None = Soft Over-ripe Musty note Week 1 No Longer Identifiable

\- After  2 ¬Ω weeks steep Tart Citrus note blends with Riper Papaya-like note = Semi-Ripe

\- Possible Uses: Beverages, Creams & Bakeries | Not a Heavy Fleshy Papaya
